name: SevenStar Infotech
description:
SevenStar Infotech, Mobile Application Development, Website Development and Website Designing firm based in India, is the firm uttering versatile web solutions, which are the most hunky-dory. We integrate an idyllic creativity of our brilliant designer teamwith the amazing Level of professional perfection. 
 
Key Services:
Mobile Application Development (Android & iOS)
Game Development (Cocoas2d,Unity3d)
Cross Platform App Development
Web Application Development
Ecommerce Development
Enterprise Solutions
Emerging Technology Services (AR/VR Solution, IoT, Wearables, iBeacon)
Core Values:
Values represent the beliefs and principles that shape company’s character and guide day-to-day behavior. It assists us in achieving our vision by providing guidance for the way we take decisions, behave and prioritize as we conduct business and interact with others.
 Customer-Centered: We are fully committed to deliver best value for investment to our clients while maintaining the highest standards in terms of confidentiality, commitment, cost, quality and time.
 Excellence: We, at SevenStar, continuously strive for excellence by “raising the bar” and delivering the best value to our customers.
 Efficiency & Effectiveness: We, at SevenStar, strive to maintain a lean organization, lowering the total cost of ownership and providing best value to our customers.
Projects Delivered 500+,
Clients 200+,
Industries Serve 22+,
Global Offices 3.
